article_title: OPEN THREAD: The Final GOP Debate of 2015 Live From Las Vegas
article_text:
All eyes are on Donald Trump as he continues to dominate in the polls and as he hurls attacks at grassroots favorite Ted Cruz. Marco Rubio is expected to do well tonight as he's consistently delivered a strong foreign policy strategy for months.

We encourage you to join the conversation, especially since our commenting system is back. For instructions about how to sign up, click here.



Here we go, live from Las Vegas....

article_metadata.author: Katie Pavlich
